name: Soy Solution
method: Mixture is Steamed and later dilute with 2 litres of water
When serving use 1 Pump per shot

name: Choc Slurry
method: Measure 2 litres of Hot water in the Jug first
Then add 2 kg of Chocolate Powder
At the end whisk gently at the end to have less bubbles
Leave out until room temp before filling to sauce bottles

name: Chai Slurry
method: Starting with the Hot Water first

name: Matcha Slurry
method: Mix Hot Water @ 80 degrees with Brown Sugar first
Then Add Matcha with a strainer
